body:
You must be the new student.
Working from a game expo eh?
Our med school gets all kinds..

Alright, we'll take things slow.
Hah!
Here's your first patient.
Just SLAM YOUR PACEMAKER on the SEVENTH BEAT.
Remember, only the SEVENTH BEAT.
Here we go!

title: 1 Miss
body:
Almost!
Try really hitting your pacemaker HARD, like you're deploying a nuclear missile. It helps your timing!

title: 1 Perfect
body:
Oh, look at you.
You clearly know how to do this already..
Congratulations.
That's it. One more time, without cues.

Alright. You've got the hang of it.
Your first patient is waiting outside.
He's got quite the heart rate..
Well, see you in the ER.

title: 1 No Input
body:
Oh dear.
Remember to hit your pacemaker on the SEVENTH BEAT.

title: 0 No Input
body:
Oh, hit your pacemaker to advance the text.
There we go.
..you should know that kind of thing already..

title: EveryBeat
body:
HEY!!
You dont have to press on every beat! Just the SEVENTH.
